SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description1Txt: THE FOUNDATION HAS NO DIRECT CHARITABLE ACTIVITIES. IT ONLY DISBURSES CHARITABLE FUNDS TO OTHER TAX-EXEMPT ORGANIZATIONS.

SumOfProgramRelatedInvstGrp.Description1Txt: THE FOUNDATION DOES NOT HAVE ANY PROGRAM-REALTED INVESTMENTS

ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: Information on the application process, as well as a link to the portal, can be found at www.louisborickfoundation.org.
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.SubmissionDeadlinesTxt: Please visit www.louisborickfoundation.org for current submission deadlines.
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RestrictionsOnAwardsTxt: All applicants must be classified as a public charity and tax exempt under 501(c)(3) and 509 (a)(1) or (2) of the internal revenue code. The foundation does not consider funding requests for personal needs of individuals, political campaigns, or lobbying efforts.
